text.div:
This code system https://www.charite.de/fhir/digipod/CodeSystem/digipod defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
001 N5 elektiv
002 N4 innerhalb 12-24 h
003 N3 innerhalb 6-12 h
004 N2 innerhalb 1-6 h
005 N1 innerhalb 1 h
006 N0 sofort
007 Date of surgical procedure
009 Result of Charlson Comorbidity Index
012 Result of Addenbrooke cognitive examination revised
013 Index-based Electroencephalogram monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance
014 Monitoring burst suppression patterns
015 Encephalographic density spectral array
016 Nursing Delirium Screening Scale (NU-DESC) score
017 4AT score
018 Confusion Assessment Method score
019 Delirium Rating Scale score
020 Delirium Observation Scale score
021 3-minute Diagnostic Interview for CAM-defined Delirium score
022 Confusion Assessment Method for the Intensive Care Unit score
023 Delirium Detection Score score
024 Intensive Care Delirium Screening Checklist score
025 Day shiftDay shift is called 'Fr체hschicht' and lasts from 6am to 2pm
026 Evening shiftEvening shift is called 'Sp채tschicht' and lasts from 2pm to 10pm
027 Night shiftNight shift is called 'Nachtschicht' and lasts from 10pm to 6am of the next day

name: DIGIPOD
title: DIGIPOD
description: Concepts required in recommendations that are not defined elsewhere for the project DIGIPOD

concept.display: Result of Addenbrooke cognitive examination revised
Index-based Electroencephalogram monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance
3-minute Diagnostic Interview for CAM-defined Delirium score
Confusion Assessment Method for the Intensive Care Unit score
Intensive Care Delirium Screening Checklist score

Evening shift is called 'Sp채tschicht' and lasts from 2pm to 10pm
Night shift is called 'Nachtschicht' and lasts from 10pm to 6am of the next day
